department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Requires purchasing a Closed circuit television (C CCT V) Video Monitoring System at  Yarmouth, NS and to be completed by 31 Mar 2023. Also modifying the closing report date to 01 January 2023
duration_in_months: So long as the purchaser directs” “6 months from order placement, after delivery is completed”
